Monologue.Current: Большой проказник{Line}“......”
Monologue.Original: Big Bad Rascal{Line}“......”

Monologue.Current: “Аааай!”
Monologue.Original: “Ahhhhh!”

Monologue.Current: “ОН ОПЯТЬ!..”
Monologue.Original: “THAT’S...MEEEEAN!”

Monologue.Current: “Ненавижу! Он постоянно{Line} надо мной издевается!..”
Monologue.Original: “I hate him...{Line} He’s always playing mean tricks on me...”

Monologue.Current: Владелец отеля{Line}“Малышка, ты в порядке?{Line} Тебе не больно?
Monologue.Original: Hotel Owner{Line}“Are you all right, baby?{Line} Did you hurt yourself?”

Monologue.Current: Владелец отеля{Line}“Пусть только попадётся мне,{Line} маленький паршивец!”
Monologue.Original: Hotel Owner{Line}“That kid’s always up to no good!{Line} Next time, I’m gonna give him a spankin’.”

Monologue.Current: “Ребёнок он или нет,{Line} никто не смеет обижать{Line} мою дочь!”
Monologue.Original: “I don’t care if it’s a kid or what, but{Line} nobody is allowed to tease my daughter.”

Monologue.Current: Hotel Owner{Line}“Zell!{Line} That goes for you, too!”
Monologue.Original: Hotel Owner{Line}“Zell!{Line} That goes for you, too!”

Monologue.Current: Zell{Line}“HUH!?{Pause 64}{Line} Why me!?”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“HUH!?{Pause 64}{Line} Why me!?”

Monologue.Current: Hotel Owner{Line}“You’re also the type who acts mean and{Line} teases someone whom you like, aren’t you?”
Monologue.Original: Hotel Owner{Line}“You’re also the type who acts mean and{Line} teases someone whom you like, aren’t you?”

Monologue.Current: “Just don’t go overboard!{Line} Or else you’ll be sorry.”
Monologue.Original: “Just don’t go overboard!{Line} Or else you’ll be sorry.”

Monologue.Current: Irvine{Line}“A-ha-haha!{Line} That’s the kind of thing{Line} I used to do, a long time ago!”
Monologue.Original: Irvine{Line}“A-ha-haha!{Line} That’s the kind of thing{Line} I used to do, a long time ago!”

Monologue.Current: Irvine{Line}“Ain’t that so, Zell?”
Monologue.Original: Irvine{Line}“Ain’t that so, Zell?”

Monologue.Current: Zell{Line}“Y...Yeah!{Line} That’s right!”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“Y...Yeah!{Line} That’s right!”

Monologue.Current: “It’s been almost 10 years{Line} since I took over this hotel...{Line} Many travellers have come and gone.”
Monologue.Original: “It’s been almost 10 years{Line} since I took over this hotel...{Line} Many travellers have come and gone.”

Monologue.Current: “It’s about time I started thinking{Line} about my own well-being.{Line} Hey, how about a family vacation!?”
Monologue.Original: “It’s about time I started thinking{Line} about my own well-being.{Line} Hey, how about a family vacation!?”

Monologue.Current: “В следующий раз я нарисую{Line} эту рыбу!”
Monologue.Original: “I’m going to draw a picture{Line} of that fish next time.”

Monologue.Current: “Папа сказал, что купит{Line} мне много синих мелков!”
Monologue.Original: “Daddy said he’s going to{Line} buy me a lot of blue crayons.”

Monologue.Current: Владелец отеля{Line}“Морской бриз...”{Next}“Весь город полнится{Line} ароматами моря...”
Monologue.Original: Hotel Owner{Line}“The sea breeze sure feels good.”{Next}“The whole town, filled with the{Line} wonderful aroma of the sea...{Line} ...And...”

Monologue.Current: “Вот почему ржавеет моя машина!{Line} И эта вывеска скоро отвалится...”
Monologue.Original: “...That is why my car rusts.{Line} That sign’s not lookin’ too good, either.”

Monologue.Current: Владелец отеля{Line}“«Баламба отель стоит вам посетить,{Line} здесь морской бриз голову освежит...»”{Next}“Ну как, сгодится для рекламы?..”
Monologue.Original: Hotel Owner{Line}“‘Come to the blue Balamb Hotel,{Line} where the sea breeze{Line} will take you away...’”{Next}“How’s that{Line} for a catch line...?”

Monologue.Current: “Да вам и за миллион лет{Line} ничего лучше не придумать.”
Monologue.Original: “Not in a million years{Line} would you be able to{Line} come up with something better.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Zell}{Line}“Ну и бред. У меня даже{Line} голова закружилась!”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“Pu-lease!{Line} Blow it out your rear!”

Monologue.Current: Владелец отеля{Line}“Закружилась...{Line} Точно! Закружилась!”
Monologue.Original: Hotel Owner{Line}“...Blow...{Line} ...That’s it! Blow!”

Monologue.Current: Владелец отеля{Line}“«Здесь морской бриз голову вскружит...»”
Monologue.Original: Hotel Owner{Line}“Where the sea breeze will{Line} ‘blow’ you away...”

Monologue.Current: Владелец отеля{Line}“Прости, но мне нельзя играть.{Line} Жена меня прибьет...”
Monologue.Original: Hotel Owner{Line}“Sorry, but I’m not allowed to{Line} play cards right now.{Line} My wife is very strict...”

Monologue.Current: “Ребята, вы играете в карты?”{Line}Да{Line}Нет
Monologue.Original: “Do you kids play cards?”{Line}Yes{Line}No

Monologue.Current: “You seem to know rules{Line} unfamiliar to this region.{Line} Let’s play a game with{Line} Balamb’s rules and ours.”
